column1: #text=I arrived at the airport with my luggage , identification , boarding pass , and some spare cash .
#text=I went up to the front desk and asked if my flight was currently on time , and it was .
#text=I waited in the lobby for a few minutes until they announced that the plane was now boarding for my flight to California .
#text=I got up with my luggage and belongings and walked towards the terminal .
#text=A worker scanned my boarding pass with a special scanner , and I then took off my shoes and set them in a bin that a worker handed me , along with my carry-on luggage .
#text=I set my big suitcase onto a cart where it would be taken onto the plane as cargo .
#text=I walked through a body scanner manned by security guards and passed through it without a problem .
#text=Then , I got my carry-on luggage and shoes back and put them on .
#text=I walked through a tunnel onto the airplane and sat down .
#text=I listened to the instructions that were said over a speaker and the plane took off after a long wait .
#text=Then , I listened to music on my smartphone and fell asleep for the full four hour flight .
#text=When I woke up , the plane was landing and I looked out my window and saw California .
#text=We had made it safely to our destination .
